thread.title: very happy with selection
thread.title_full: very happy with selection - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Thomas S
title: very happy with selection
text:
I only thing I was unhappy with happend only once. I wanted to end the night with a glass of wine. When I got to hotel there was a private booking in the hotel lounge abd I was denied entry. I wish they would not promote facilities that may or may not be available to guests.
Room Tip: I left pounds on the bed for housekepping tip. It was moved to the bedside table. Never collected... See more room tips
